March 24, 1943 D West Riding Contest (3rd Section)
West Riding Contest (3rd Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Riding Contest west-riding-contest-3rd-section
Eastbrook Hall, Bradford Hymn tune contest - 1st Markham Main, 2nd Upton Colliery, 3rd Bradford Victoria Boys. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 31, 2019, 10:38 a.m. Jan. 31, 2019, 10:41 a.m.
1 Upton Colliery Workpeople's Band A. Barnett
2 Markham Main Colliery Band Edwin Griffiths
3 Gomersal Mills Matthew Nevin
4 Bradford Victoria Boys Tom Atkinson
